Do you want to functional/acceptance-test your application, test the 
GUI, =
or test your application through your GUI (if the latter, I doubt 
too many=
 people will want to help you down that path)?

The toolkits you mentioned =
are all free, so why don't you invest a 
little time and determine which wo=
rks best for you?

> Hi,=

>
> I've been asked to find a capture/playback GUI testing tool to use 
> =
initially on one of our products that is a stand-alone workbench type 
> ap=
plication that does a lot of database operations and has a canvas to

ow users to add and manipulate data.=A0 Ideally we'd be able to run 
> the =
tests as JUnit tests and initiate them from our Ant build files.=A0

rtunately no standard JUnit tests were written for the application

der Extensions/GUI Tools (Jacareto, Abbot, Marathon, etc.).
>
